function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survey participants potentially being unaware of their COVID-19 status and spreading the virus during in-person interactions.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission within the community.","Mitigation":"Encourage participants to get tested for COVID-19 and follow public health guidelines on social distancing and mask-wearing.","Technologies":"COVID-19 testing facilities, contact tracing apps, public health announcements.","People":"Community members, especially those in close contact with survey participants.","Owner":"Public health authorities, survey organizers."},{"Description":"Survey participants experiencing negative emotional and psychological health during lockdown, leading to decreased overall well-being.","Impact":"Decreased mental health and well-being of participants, potentially affecting their interactions with others and their ability to adhere to public health guidelines.","Mitigation":"Provide mental health resources and support, offer guidance on coping strategies, and promote community-based mental health services.","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps, virtual support groups.","People":"Survey participants, their family and friends, and the broader community.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations, community support groups."},{"Description":"Potential bias in the survey data due to exclusion of individuals over the age of 70 who were strongly advised to stay at home during lockdown.","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of the impact of lockdown on the older population, leading to skewed conclusions and recommendations.","Mitigation":"Conduct separate outreach and data collection efforts for the older population, ensuring their experiences are captured and analyzed separately.","Technologies":"Remote data collection tools, telecommunication platforms for interviews and surveys.","People":"Individuals over the age of 70, researchers, policymakers.","Owner":"Research organizations, government agencies."}]}
